titleStmt.title: A declaration concerning state-farthings; or, Certain remonstrative reasons for the allowance thereof; wherein is comprised, 1 the honour of the states vindicated, 2 the peoples hearts contented, 3 the Common-wealths good propagated, 4 the relief of the poor increased. By Thomas Dunstervile, citizen of London.
titleStmt.author: Dunstervile, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Harvard University Library.
